task: Develop a basic 'Pokémon' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Don't be afraid of things because they're easy to do'.
name: Pokémon: Simple Quest

branding_data.short_description: Pokémon: Simple Quest is a streamlined adventure focusing on the joy of easy-to-learn mechanics and pure exploration.
branding_data.detailed_description: Pokémon: Simple Quest invites players into a world where the thrill of Pokémon collecting and battling is made more accessible and enjoyable. The game simplifies complex mechanics, allowing players to focus on exploring a vibrant world, catching Pokémon, and engaging in battles without the usual complexities. With a friendly and welcoming design, it encourages players to embrace the joy of discovery and interaction. The game emphasizes ease of play, ensuring that both newcomers and seasoned trainers can enjoy the journey without getting bogged down in intricate details. The gameplay encourages creativity and experimentation, making it perfect for those who want to experience the essence of Pokémon in a more straightforward, yet still rewarding way.
